body:
Hello everyone,
I'd like to inform you that Howsie will be taking a break from his Director of Staff role on the Avicus Network for an unconfirmed period of time. He isn't releasing any information at the moment, but you can most likely expect to see a letter of absence in the near future. Please do not spam his Skype asking questions, he will release information when he feels the need to. 
Sorry to bring you this news,
Max
body_tagged:
Hello everyone,
I'd like to inform you that Howsie will be taking a break from his Director of Staff role on the Avicus Network for an unconfirmed period of time. He isn't releasing any information at the moment, but you can most likely expect to see a letter of absence in the near future. Please do not spam his Skype asking questions, he will release information when he feels the need to. 
Sorry to bring you this news,
Max

replies.body:
Sorry Howsie, I was only joking when I said this:

[11:03:03 AM] Tino (っ・ω・)っ: telibot
[11:03:21 AM] Tino (っ・ω・)っ: Mind explaining to me what Howsie is doing?
[11:28:41 AM] Andy [tel6331 Avicus Manager, mc-sq Admin]: not yet
[11:29:53 AM] Tino (っ・ω・)っ: howsie22
[11:30:02 AM] Tino (っ・ω・)っ: Howsie has 6 letters, 2 + 2 = 4
[11:30:14 AM] Tino (っ・ω・)っ: 6x4=24
[11:30:26 AM] Tino (っ・ω・)っ: There is a total of 8 characters in his name
[11:30:35 AM] Tino (っ・ω・)っ: 24/8=3
[11:30:40 AM] Tino (っ・ω・)っ: 3=triangle
[11:30:49 AM] Tino (っ・ω・)っ: HOWSIE IS ILLUMINATI CONFIRMED

If this is what you meant by Skype spam, then Im proven guilty.
